name: Orb Jumper
description:
This is the first game I have made using any sort of game engine, so I made this game almost purely as a test to see how game engines work. I made it using Unreal Engine 4's Blueprint system. You can tell I had time constraints of just one day on this as most of the actors I did not make myself.

WASD + space to move, or you can use the arrow keys. L Shift increases speed and momentum. There are 10 orbs scattered across the map to find. It doesn't tell you when you have collected them all as I had time constraints on this project. There is a very basic walljumping mechanic where certain walls briefly propel you upwards.
